episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4001_1101:
Attention, please: The sync pair contest will
begin soon.

All contestants, please make your way to
the stage.
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4001_0401:
Yikes! Just take slow, deep breaths! It’ll help you
calm down!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4001_0402:
No, you’re not! I can tell you’re nervous!
Just take some slow, deep breaths. It’ll help
you calm down!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4001_1001:
C’mon, just breathe after me!
Inhaaaaale...and exhaaaaale...
Inhaaaaale...and exhaaaaale...

There, see? All better!
All right, let’s go over the rules of the contest.

Sync pair contests are divided into three separate
competitions: visual, dance, and razzle-dazzle.

Your total points from all three competitions are
added up, and whoever has the most points at the
end wins!

And unlike contests in other regions, here
they’ll be judging the bond between you and
your Pokémon!
Anyway, first up is the visual competition!

My Turtwig is so awesome and adorable! I can’t
wait to show her off to everyone!
What are we waiting for? Let’s head to the stage!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_1001:
That was over so fast! Did you put on a good
show for the judges, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_0401:
Nice! You might be more cut out for contests than
we thought!
I think I did all right with Turtwig, but...

I dunno. I feel like I could have used my time
better and REALLY shown off just how awesome
and adorable she is!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_0302: I wish I did a better job!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_0402:
I know, right? Contests never go the way you
expect them to.
I think I did all right with Turtwig, but...

I dunno, I feel like I could have used my time
better and REALLY shown off just how awesome
and adorable she is!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_1101:
The dance competition will begin soon.
All contestants, please make your way to
the stage.
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_1001:
All right! Time to focus up and power through the
next competition!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_0301: I know you can do it!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_0401: Thanks! I’m rooting for you, too!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_0402: Yeah, that’s the spirit! Let’s do our best out there!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4002_1001:
Oh, by the way, did you see that Fantina is
here, too?

Fantina is an accomplished dancer and a contest
regular back in Sinnoh.
We definitely need to be on our toes!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_1001:
Omigosh, Turtwig! That was amazing!
You are the perfect partner!
Whenever and wherever, dance, dance, dance!

If you dance all the time, the dancing at the
contests, they become challenges no longer!

I must say, the sync pairs on Pasio are
truly magnificent!

My partner and I have found so many sources of
inspiration here! We’re sure to become even more
spectacular now!
Hey, what did you think of the dance competition?
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_0401:
Oh, merci! But you, too, were fantastique!
Très fantastique!

Your partner is so cute and cool! Et aussi
très pretty!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_0402:
Why, thank you! It seems my illusions have won
me another fan!

But you all were amazing, too! Your dances were
positively spellbinding!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_1001:
Out of all of us, I’d say you had the best
dance chemistry with your Pokémon.
But you’d better watch your back!

I don’t care if it’s you, Fantina, or Wallace.
I’m not gonna lose to anybody!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_1101:
The razzle-dazzle competition will begin soon.
Contestants, please make your way to the stage.
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_1001:
Well, no matter what happens, let’s get out there
and finish this!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_0401:
Oh, that’s right! I haven’t explained what this
competition is!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_0302:
Are we competing to see who can
eat the most Razz Berries?
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_0402:
No? Why would you think that? Oh, that’s right!
I haven’t explained what this competition is!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4003_1001:
The razzle-dazzle competition is une compétition
spécial exclusive to Pasio!

Contestants are judged on their dazzling display
during a Pokémon battle!

In other words, we give everything we’ve got
and show off what makes us shine in battle!

It’s been a really close contest so far, so we’re
gonna have to bring our A game!

Fantina and Wallace are going to be
tough opponents.
But the one I really need to watch out for is...
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4004_1001:
Prepare to be dazzled by our magnificent
water illusions!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4004_0401:
True to form, Wallace’s moves are so striking
and elegant!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4004_0402: Now, let’s see which of us shines brightest!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4004_1001:
Wallace is definitely a tough opponent. But we can
do this!

Hehe... And I thought I was supposed to be
teaching you. You really are incredible.

I have people cheering me on. I can’t let
them down!
Forget being nervous! You ready, Turtwig?
Let’s show them what we’re made of!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_1101:
The results of the sync pair contest will be
announced soon.

All contestants and spectators, please direct your
attention to the display.

Coming in second place...
it’s [Name:PlayerNickname ] and Pikachu!

And in first place...
Give a round of applause to Dawn and Turtwig!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_1201:
Magnificent! I realize now that you two are
wonderful Trainers indeed!

I’m immensely pleased to have had the opportunity
to meet you both.

Congratulations on the win, Dawn. And to you,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ], for coming in
second place!

Fantastique! The two of you are amazing that you
were able to defeat me!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_0401:
Thanks! But you deserve a congratulations, too!
You came in second! That’s awesome!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_0402:
Congratulations, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I’m proud to be your mentor!
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_1201:
I can’t believe you got second place in your first
contest! That’s amazing!

I was so nervous, thinking that I had to prove
to everybody how great Turtwig is.
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_0401:
Then you must perform really well
under pressure.
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_0402:
That's true. Some people can perform really well
under pressure.
episode_event_ch0116_00_hikari/4005_1201:
It was only thanks to you that I was able to
get my head on straight!

I’m supposed to be your mentor, but you ended
up helping me.

I might not be the best mentor, but you can
always count on me!
